thought: To implement the main workflow, I need to define all the necessary actions and the manual trigger first. The workflow requires reading data from Google Sheets, classifying entries with AI, sending messages to Slack, generating reminder emails with AI, and sending emails via Gmail.
plan: Define a manual trigger for starting the workflow.
Define action to read data from Google Sheets with the given documentId and sheetName.
Define action for the first aiCompletion to classify commercial entry descriptions.
Define action for Slack message posting to send classification results.
Define action for the second aiCompletion to generate reminder emails for 'to Customer' entries.
Define action to send emails via Gmail.
criticism: Currently, no actions or triggers are defined, so the workflow cannot run and raises NotImplementedError.

functions.comments: Manual trigger to start the workflow when clicked.
Read all rows from the specified Google Sheet document and sheetName.
TODO: Configure documentId and sheetName in params.

functions.comments: First aiCompletion to classify each commercial entry Description as 'to Business' or 'to Customer'.
Send each classification result to Slack channel #general as a message.
Second aiCompletion to generate reminder emails for 'to Customer' commercial flows.
TODO: Test AI summarization and reminder generation.

functions.comments: Send reminder emails to corresponding managers with Gmail.
